challenges.question: pip install --upgrade robotframework-seleniumlibrary
challenges.answer: Install Python-specific modules and use --upgrade to upgrade the existing python specific module

challenges.question: git submodule sync
challenges.answer: Apply the remote repo's configuration to your local submodule repos. Make the child repo follow the parent repo. It is similar to master/slave

challenges.question: source path to python exe location/scripts/activate
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade && sudo apt-get install
challenges.answer: These are the common commands in Linux to install and upgrade packages.

challenges.question: python -m http.server {port}
challenges.answer: To run the tests on the desired port or to test changes locally.

challenges.question: docker-compose up --build
challenges.answer: To start the process in detached mode and specify the -d switch to start in detached mode.

challenges.question: curl -L https://git.io/rustlings | bash
challenges.answer: To install the package to the default path

challenges.question: xvfb-run --server-args='-screen 0 1024x768x24' python test_script.py
challenges.answer: To run the script in a headless display screen with the given dimensions.

challenges.question: ssh -i /Users/yaroslav/.ncluster/ncluster5-yaroslav-316880547378-us-east-1.pem -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ubuntu@18.206.193.26tmux a
challenges.answer: Ssh/Login into a Ubuntu instance using a .pem file(trust chain with user identification) where host key is not being checked for login purposes.
